meanings.definition: A person who seeks to complete a collection or set.
meanings.sent1: The completist was determined to collect every coin in the series.
meanings.sent2: She is a completist when it comes to gathering stamps from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The completist made sure to have every book in the series, even the rare ones.
meanings.sent4: His completist nature drove him to search high and low for the missing puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: Being a completist, she meticulously organized her collection by color and size.

meanings.definition: Someone who has an obsessive need to finish tasks or projects.
meanings.sent1: The completist couldn't rest until every detail of the project was perfect.
meanings.sent2: As a completist, he would stay up late just to complete all his assignments.
meanings.sent3: The completist even color-coded his to-do list to ensure nothing was left undone.
meanings.sent4: Her completist tendencies made her the go-to person for meeting tight deadlines.
meanings.sent5: With his completist attitude, he never left a task unfinished, no matter how small.
